scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a letter from newly elected Washington State Senator Daniel J. Evans to Pennsylvania Senator Hugh Scott concerning his pleasure at seeing Scott; hoping they can get together again; and requesting Scott's advice and observations on the U.S. Senate and the current political scene.
